description: System-generated unique identifier for the export process record.
Human-friendly label for this export process.
Name of the source database view from which this export retrieves records.
Hierarchy level used to order and nest related exports; parent levels run before their children.
Name of the parent view that this export depends on when joining related data.
Join key in the parent view used to relate parent records to this export’s records.
Join key in this view used to link back to the parent view’s key.
Identifier of the user who created this export configuration.
Timestamp when this export configuration was created.
Identifier of the user who last modified this export configuration.
Timestamp when this export configuration was last modified.
